message.msgid: Upgrading. DO NOT POWER OFF THE DEVICE!
Please enter a correct email address.
message.msgstr: 请输入正确的邮箱地址

message.msgid: Error! Please enter a correct password.
Error! Please enter a correct username.
Please specify a valid time range.
Please enter a correct IP address.
message.msgstr: 请输入正确的 IP 地址

message.msgid: Please enter a correct subnet mask.
message.msgstr: 请输入正确的子网掩码

message.msgid: Please enter a correct MAC address.
message.msgstr: 请输入正确的 MAC 地址

message.msgid: Please enter number, letter, or underscore.
message.msgstr: 请输入数字，字母或下划线

message.msgid: The second digit in the first group of MAC address should be an even number.
message.msgstr: MAC 地址的第二个字符必须为偶数

message.msgid: The IP address cannot be multicast, broadcast, or loopback address.
message.msgstr: IP 地址不能为组播,广播或环回地址

message.msgid: The first byte of the IP cannot be 127 (Loopback addresses).
message.msgstr: 以127开始的地址为保留的环回地址，请指定一个1到223之间的值。

message.msgid: The first byte of the IP cannot be %s.Please specify a value from 1 to 223.
message.msgstr: 以%s开始的地址无效，请指定一个1到223之间的值。

message.msgid: The first byte of the IP cannot be %s.Please specify a value from 223 to 255.
message.msgstr: 以 %s 开始的地址无效，请指定一个223到255之间的值。

message.msgid: There is a mismatch between IP address and subnet mask.Please change IP address or subnet mask.
message.msgstr: 无效的 IP 地址和子网掩码合并，请修改 IP 地址或子网掩码.

message.msgid: IP conflict! The login IP address will be changed into %s automatically.Please log in again using %s.
message.msgstr: 检测到IP地址冲突，登录 IP 地址将自动修改为%s，请以%s重新登录界面。

message.msgid: Auto detection: Your current connetion type may be DHCP.But IP conflicts occur.The login IP will be changed to %s .Please log in again using %s.
message.msgstr: 系统监测到你当前联网方式可能为DHCP，但是存在IP冲突。登录 IP 地址将自动修改为192.168.1.1，请以192.168.1.1重新登录界面。

message.msgid: There is no Ethernet cable inserting to WAN port, please plug an Ethernet cable to WAN port.
message.msgstr: 检测到WAN口网线未连接，请检查并连接好您的WAN口网线。

message.msgid: Checking the username and password, please wait. It will take 1~5 minutes.
message.msgstr: 正在诊断您输入的宽带用户名和宽带密码是否正确，请稍等，整个过程约1-5分钟。

message.msgid: Failed. Please confirm your username and password and try again.
message.msgstr: 用户名密码验证失败，请确认您的宽带用户名与宽带密码并重新输入。

message.msgid: Remote server gives no response. Please make sure your PC can access the Internet without a router.If not, consult your ISP for help.
message.msgstr: 网络运营商远端无响应，请确认不接路由器时是否可以正常上网，如不能，请联系当地网络运营商解决。

message.msgid: Dial-up succeeded. But the router is not connected to the Internet.
message.msgstr: 拨号成功，但无法连接至互联网。

message.msgid: Please make sure your PC can access the Internet without a router.If not, consult your ISP for help.
message.msgstr: 请确认不使用路由器时是否可以正常上网，如不能，请联系您的宽带运营商。

message.msgid: Your Internet connection type may be PPPoE as detected.Please enter correct username and password.
message.msgstr: 系统检测到您的联网方式可能为ADSL拨号，请填写完整的宽带用户名和密码，

message.msgid: Click OK to try to access the Internet.
Your Internet connection type may be Static IP as detected. Please select Static IP and configure the network parameters manually.
message.msgstr: 系统检测到您的联网方式可能为静态IP，请手动选择并配置静态IP，尝试联网。

message.msgid: The router has obtained a valid IP address but cannot access the Internet. Please try the solutions below one by one.
message.msgstr: 系统已获取到IP，但无法连接至互联网，请依次尝试以下操作

message.msgid: 2. Try to configure the router on a PC which can access the Internet without a router. (Connect the PC to the router via an Ethernet cable.)
message.msgstr: 2. 在不使用路由器时可正常上网的电脑上重新配置(电脑与路由器间需用网线连接)

message.msgid: 3. Please make sure your PC can access the Internet without a router.If not, consult your ISP for help.
message.msgstr: 3. 请确认不使用路由器时是否可以正常上网，如不能，请联系您的宽带运营商。

message.msgid: Your Internet connection type may be PPPoE as detected.Please click OK to try to access the Internet.
message.msgstr: 系统检测到您的联网方式可能为ADSL拨号，请点击“确定”尝试联网。

message.msgid: The IP cannot be in the same net segment as the login IP %s!
message.msgstr: IP 地址不能与登录 IP(%s)在同一网段！

message.msgid: The default gateway cannot be the same as the login IP %s!
message.msgstr: 默认网关不能与登录 IP(%s)相同！

message.msgid: The IP cannot be the same as default gateway or DNS server.
message.msgstr: IP 地址不能与默认网关或 DNS 服务器相同！

message.msgid: The WiFi name(SSID) can only include 10 non-ASCII characters.
message.msgstr: 当无线信号名称中含有中文字符时，最长只能输入10个字符

message.msgid: WiFi password is changed into %s.You'll need to use the new password to reconnect to the WiFi. Are you sure to change the password?
message.msgstr: 无线更改密码为%s,需用新密码重新连接路由器！确认更改吗？需用新密码重新连接路由器！确认更改吗？
mac地址克隆中，请等待页面响应...

message.msgid: Suggest changing WiFi name while changing the WiFi password to ensure proper WiFi connection.
message.msgstr: 为避免因修改密码而导致无线连接不上，建议同时修改无线信号名称
请输入宽带运营商提供的账号
请输入宽带运营商提供的密码

message.msgid: You need to disable WPS feature before you change the WiFi name (SSID).
message.msgstr: 在系统设置中关闭wps后，才可修改无线信号名称

message.msgid: You need to disable WPS feature before you change the WiFi Password.
message.msgstr: 在系统设置中关闭wps后，才可修改密码

message.msgid: The password field cannot be empty.

message.msgstr: 密码的长度只能为3-32个字符

message.msgid: Your browser is outdated. For better display, suggest updating to IE8 or newer version, or setting up Firefox or Google.
message.msgstr: 您的浏览器版本太低，为了更好的显示页面，请升级到IE8及以上版本或安装火狐，谷歌等浏览器

message.msgid: Restore the router to factory default if you forget the password.
message.msgstr: 如忘记密码，只能将路由器复位。

message.msgid: Do as follows: Connect the router to the power supply. Press and hold the WIFI/RST button for about 10 seconds, and then release.
message.msgstr: 方法：连接电源，长按路由器上的WIFI/RST键约10秒后松开(注意：此操作将还原路由器所有设置，您需重新设置路由器才能上网)。

message.msgid: Dear user, you can enjoy the Internet immediately after finishing the configuration on this page.
message.msgstr: 亲爱的用户，轻松一步完成此页设置，即可畅享互联网~

message.msgid: Select PPPoE if you access the Internet with username and password provided by your ISP without a router.
message.msgstr: 适用于电信、联通等网络环境，使用宽带用户名和宽带密码上网的用户

message.msgid: Select DHCP if you access the Internet directly as soon as you insert the Ethernet cable into your PC.
message.msgstr: 适用于酒店、有线电视等网络环境，电脑不需要进行任何配置就可上网的用户

message.msgid: Select Static IP if you access the Internet with static IP and other network parameters provided by your ISP without a router.
message.msgstr: 适用于公司、光纤接入等网络环境，使用固定IP地址上网的用户

message.msgid: There are no devices connected to the router.
Forbid/Permit all the devices to access the Internet except Native Device.
message.msgstr: 批量限制(解除)除本机外的主机

message.msgid: Turn on/off to enable/disable the device to access the Internet.
message.msgstr: 开启互联网访问启用此项

message.msgid: You have forbidden 20 devices. If added one more, the initial entry will be cleared.
message.msgstr: 禁止上网主机已满20条，自动将初始条目清除！

message.msgid: You have limited 20 devices. If added one more, the initial entry will be cleared.
message.msgstr: 限速主机已满20条，自动将初始条目清除！

message.msgid: You have noted 20 devices. If added one more, the initial entry will be cleared.
message.msgstr: 备注已满20条，自动将初始条目清除！

message.msgid: Please close the browser and connect to the WiFi again.
message.msgstr: 请关闭浏览器，并重新连接无线网络。

message.msgid: For your wireless network security, suggest setting up a WiFi password.
message.msgstr: 为保障无线网络安全，建议您设置无线密码。

message.msgid: The password cannot be less than 8 characters.

message.msgstr: 无线密码范围: 8~63 个字符!

message.msgid: You cannot browse the webpage properly unless rebooting the browser.
message.msgstr: 您必须重启浏览器才能正常浏览

message.msgid: Do not remind me any more.

message.msgstr: 请输入上级设备的无线密码

message.msgid: Are you sure to reboot the router and activate the settings?
message.msgstr: 路由器将重启使设置生效！

message.msgid: Do not change it if unnecessary.
message.msgstr: 如无特殊需要，请勿修改

message.msgid: If enabled, the wireless devices cannot find your router's WiFi name(SSID).
message.msgstr: 启用后手机，电脑等设备将无法扫描到路由器的无线信号

message.msgid: If the box is unchecked, the router will stop assigning the IP addresses.
message.msgstr: 取消勾选后路由器将停止为主机分配 IP 地址
只能输入数字，字母或下划线

message.msgid: The old password is incorrect. The settings will not be saved.
message.msgstr: 旧密码错误,设置未保存！

message.msgid: Are you sure to reboot the router?
message.msgstr: 您确定要重启路由器吗？

message.msgid: The login IP address will reset to 192.168.0.1 after restoring the router to factory default. Are you sure to restore?
message.msgstr: 恢复出厂设置将清除当前所有配置并将登录IP地址重置为：192.168.0.1，您确定继续吗？

message.msgid: Export the system logs and specify a local file to save the system logs.
message.msgstr: 导出日志，请指定保存参数的路径。

message.msgid: IP conflict! The login IP address cannot be the same as default gateway or DNS server. Please make a change.
message.msgstr: 登录ip与网关/wan口ip冲突，请修改为其它值后提交！

message.msgid: There is a mismatch between IP address and Subnet Mask.Please change the last input 255 into a value from 1 to 254.
message.msgstr: ip地址与默认子网掩码合并无效，请将ip地址最后的255修改为1-254之间的值

message.msgid: The login IP address will be changed into %s
The device will reboot automantically. Are you sure to continue?
message.msgstr: 设备将自动重启，确认提交吗？

message.msgid: The login IP address cannot be in the same net segment as the WAN IP address.
message.msgstr: lan口与wan口ip不能在同一网段！

message.msgid: Upgrading... Do not remove the power supply.
message.msgstr: 系统升级中，请勿关闭电源...

message.msgid: Please select the file with a suffix: 'trx' or 'bin'.
message.msgstr: 请选择文件名以 “trx” 或 “bin”结尾的文件

message.msgid: Error! The router will reboot automatically.
message.msgstr: 升级文件错误，系统即将重启！

message.msgid: Error! The WAN IP address cannot be in the same net segment as the LAN IP address.
message.msgstr: 错误：WAN口IP与LAN口IP不能在同一网段！

message.msgid: Please select a correct upgrade file!
message.msgstr: 请选择正确的升级文件！

message.msgid: Just go forward without Internet setup.

message.msgstr: 正在检测您的网络环境

message.msgid: Please plug an Ethernet cable to the WAN port.
message.msgstr: 请检查并连接好WAN口网线！

message.msgid: Please enter the PPPoE username and password your ISP gave you.
message.msgstr: 请输入宽带运营商提供的账号和密码

message.msgid: Static IP as detected. Set up a static IP in Internet page later.
message.msgstr: 系统检测到您的网络可能为静态IP，请稍后在上网设置页手动设置

message.msgid: DHCP as detected. Free to set Internet connection.
message.msgstr: 系统检测到您的网络可能为自动分配，无需设置即可联网

message.msgid: WiFi Name can't be leave blank
message.msgstr: 无线信号名称不能为空
无线信号长度不能超过32字节
当前无线网络未设置密码

message.msgid: Suggest setting a WiFi password for better security.
message.msgstr: 为保障网络安全，建议您设置无线密码

message.msgid: As you had changed wireless configuration, the connection will be linked down, please reconnect: %s
message.msgstr: 检测到您使用无线连接路由器，由于您更改了无线设置，连接将断开，请重新连接无线信号：%s

message.msgid: Congratulations! You can browse the Internet now!
Personalize your Router in Bandwidth and Signal pages in greater detail.
message.msgstr: 您还可以管理设置网速控制，调整WiFi信号强度

message.msgid: Disable Bridge function before you enable this function
message.msgstr: 如果要打开定时开关，请关闭无线桥接
（GMT-06：00）瓜达拉哈拉，墨西哥城，蒙特雷
（GMT）格林威治标准时间：都柏林，爱丁堡，里斯本，伦敦
（GMT+01:00）贝尔格莱德，布拉迪斯拉发，布达佩斯，卢布尔雅那，布拉格
（GMT+01:00）萨拉热窝，斯科普里，华沙，萨格勒布
（GMT+01:00）布鲁塞尔，哥本哈根，马德里，巴黎
（GMT+01:00）阿姆斯特丹，柏林，伯尔尼，罗马，斯德哥尔摩，维也纳
（GMT+02:00）雅典，布加勒斯特，伊斯坦布尔
（GMT+02:00）赫尔辛基，基辅，里加，索非亚，塔林，维尔纽斯
（GMT+03:00）莫斯科，圣彼得堡，伏尔加格勒
（GMT+08:00）北京，重庆，香港特别行政区，乌鲁木齐

message.msgid: (GMT+11:00)Magadan, Solomon Islands, New Caledonia and more
message.msgstr: （GMT+11:00）马加丹，所罗门群岛，新喀里多

message.msgid: (GMT+12:00)Fiji Islands, Kamchatka Peninsula, the Marshall Islands
message.msgstr: （GMT+12:00）斐济群岛，堪察加半岛，马绍尔群岛

message.msgid: Time has been synchronized with Internet successfully
message.msgstr: 当前时间已与互联网同步

message.msgid: Time will be automantically synchronized with Internet
message.msgstr: 联网后自动更新当前时间
